column4: I have 7.04, and the computer doesnt load it anymore, i am trying to go back to windows XP
how do i boot to xp?
its not help with windows
i have ubuntu 7.04, i want to boot windows from it
recovery mode doesnt load
it loads a blank screen
with HDC:lost interrupt
i sorta need it back ASAP
i have a black screen right now
jordan, yes
so you are trying to totally get rid of Linux, and install XP?
so now you are saying that nothing happens when you try the live cd?
when you boot, do you get an option to "Boot to CD" ?
you've had problems installing Windows as well?  I'm starting to think it's hardware issues then.
I think your boot order is not set right.
you need to go into the bios and make sure CD is set to boot first
do you have access to another CD drive?
in the bios, change the CD line, so it boots to the other CD drive than you are using now.
there should be somewhere else near that same screen, that shows boot order of just the CD's.
I'm not so sure about that.  HDC would hint towards the motherboard.
do you  have a regular telephone line?
